messages.subject: Mt. Shasta Abbey
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/17/03 3:19:20 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:  I
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/17/03 3:19:20 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< How many Buddhist retreats are there in N. CA? >>

I can't imagine there are too many!! I looked it up and it is the Shasta
abbey in Mt. Shasta. Let me know if you find out it's the same one.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
